About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands


Endlessly curious, more than anything I love to learn about new things. The intrinsic depths of how they work, and why it's that way.

I thrive in an environment where I am challenged to work on something that's just at the cusp of my current knowledge and comfort.

Once I have questioned, dug, and read to the point of fully understanding something, I get satisfaction from

explaining my newfound knowledge to others. I believe that you never truly understand something until you

can explain it to someone with no previous knowledge of that thing.

With crystal clarity.

Awarded Degrees

B.A. English & Psychology, University of Limerick

M.Sc. Human Resource Management, University of Limerick

Certifications

HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap 4, SEO

Javascript, jQuery, Node.js, Express.js

APIs, SQL, Mongoose(DB), React.js

Professional Experience

Five years of corporate experience.

Two years running my own wordpress site,

using SEO rinciples to reach page 1 on google search.
